bio: Reef scientist integrating public goods, DeSci, and web3, based in Latam √ú
contributionDescription:
I seek solo recognition for funding public goods through DeSci/ReFi in the Optimism ecosystem. This includes initiatives like community-building, grants, educational events, conservation efforts, and innovative projects. My contributions aim to support sustainability/regeneratio and make a positive impact. My efforts encompass community building, diverse funding sources, educational outreach, sustainable innovation discussions, collaborative meetups, coral reef regeneration, transparent reporting, thought leadership engagement, NFTs, targeted outreach. I am actively engaged in divulgation and awareness efforts focused on the Hispanic community. As an editor of Week in Ethereum News (ES), all contributing to the growth and impact.

Public goods regenerate and thrive with Optimism!

impactDescription: These Optimism initiatives have had a profound impact. They include establishing the QF GreenPill Mexico chapter, securing grants for various projects, engaging the Hispanic community, showcasing sustainable innovation, and emphasizing real-world impact through initiatives like MesoReefDAO. Additionally, exploring distribution mechanisms and collecting NFTs on Zora and OP adds further innovation to the collective. The creation of mirror.xyz entries regarding Ethereum's first cohort of writers, the Greenpill Regen cohort, and DeSci. These efforts collectively drive towards a more inclusive and sustainable future within the Optimism community in Latam. The dissemination of updates and news about the Optimism Collective in Week Ethereum News (ES) is tailored for the Hispanic audience.
